name: Vibit
description:
Vibit is a simple, 2-player, quick game for Android that proves your reaction speed. Compete with your friends to see who's the fastest!

Developed using the libre Godot Game Engine.

Source code and issue tracker available at: https://gitlab.com/atorresm/vibit
